page.title: 12LAW AND ORDER
page.content: {The Solicitor.}Mrs. Plant's practice is the only one in Southminster.She has six women working for her, all part time. One is a solicitor, the others are secretaries. It is a{mixed {practice.}It conveyances houses, defends clients in court, will act in disputes, accident complaints, divorces and wills. Divorce cases represent one third of the practice's work. The crimes the practice deals with are mostly petty. Mrs. Plant sees about{thirteen clients a week}who mostly reside in the Dengie Hundred but she has acted for people as far afield as the United States of America and Australia.
